%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%
%% ARCH 2019 Autotransmission benchmark %%
%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%%

The scripts reproduce the results reported in the paper "ARCH-COMP 2019 category report: falsification"
for the transmission model.

The utilized optimization engine is called "SOAR" which can be obtained from
"https://github.com/Lmathesen/S-TaLiRO-SOAR-Optimizers"

Follow the instruction in the aformentioned link to setup Staliro with SOAR.

Add the folder ARCH2019 to Matlab path to run the scripts.
